thread.title: Meek Mill Got Dragged Into Nicki Minaj Vs. Remy Ma Beef & Other Tales From The Philly Rapper's Day
thread.title_full: Meek Mill Got Dragged Into Nicki Minaj Vs. Remy Ma Beef & Other Tales From The Philly Rapper's Day

author: Trent Clark
title: Meek Mill Got Dragged Into Nicki Minaj Vs. Remy Ma Beef & Other Tales From The Philly Rapper's Day
text:
Meek Mill picked a helluva day to get roasted on social media. 
His ex-girlfriend Nicki Minaj is currently the talk of Twitter, Instagram and Facebook after Remy Ma finally eschewed the submliminals and went for blood with her diss track, “SHETHER.” 
And now, the Philly rap stalwart’s name is getting grouped into the conversation, amongst other things. 
For starters, Meek and his crew were out and about yesterday afternoon (February 24) when a group of women asked the MMG star for a photo-op, which he declined, according to his own Snapchat story. 
The celebrity encounter immediately did a 180 as the women hopped into their Nissan Maxima with middle fingers waving and Drake’s “Back to Back” blaring from the speakers. 
“Look at these fat bitches,” he said from atop an ATV as they drove by. Fans got mad at Meek Mill that he wouldn't take a pic with them so they started bumping Drake "back to back" . He started roasting them too pic.twitter.com/SJ1zbyhuJu 
— DJ Akademiks (@IamAkademiks) February 24, 2017 
Later on that evening, his crew walked up on a seemingly homeless man begging for money. Instead of going into great philosophical thought like Kendrick Lamar , Meek decided a dollar would cost him a bit of sweat and he commanded the panhandler to drop and give him ten push-ups if he was to receive his pay. 
“Give me ten pushups, and I’m going to give you $20 right now,” he ordered. “We ain’t giving out no free money.” 
The man had no problems obliging and even went the extra mile and muscled out 20 push-ups. Meek Mill is a piece of shit man. 
I hope the media get a ahold of this and tear him a new one. pic.twitter.com/DFWet5niJa 
— The Cult of Chidism (@chidzhazenberry) February 25, 2017 
Like the above tweet alluded to, social media users didn’t find the incident amusing in the slightest bit. Meek mill is an idiot for real . How you gonna make a homeless man do push ups for $20 . 
TF?
